Pre-Game Insights: The match was called off due to wet outfield conditions in Florida.
India has already qualified for the Super 8 stage, while Canada is eliminated from the T20 World Cup 2024.
The weather in Florida is dicey, and the drainage system is not equipped to handle much rain.
This is the first time India and Canada are going against each other at the international level.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was scheduled to be played at Central Broward Park & Broward County Stadium, Florida.
India's brilliant pace attack, with Jasprit Bumrah, Arshdeep Singh, Hardik Pandya, and Mohammed Siraj combined to bag 20 wickets.
Rohit Sharma and Saad Bin Zafar will enter the ground for the toss.
Former pacer Sreesanth praised Hardik Pandya for his bowling.
Indian fielding coach T Dilip lauded wicketkeeper-batter Rishabh Pant for his performance since his return to the international cricket after a life-threatening road accident.
Canada's wicketkeeper-batter Shreyas Moova spoke about the team's preparation and performance in the tournament.
Others: The match was inconsequential for both teams as India has already qualified for the Super 8 stage, while Canada is already out of the tournament.
The pitch in Florida is known for being favorable to batters.
The India vs Canada clash on Saturday was called off due to wet outfield.
